column1: One of Biden's Covid advisors thinks life isn't worth living past the age of 75.   Another wants to lock down the entire nation for 4 to 6 weeks.   Horrible idea. https://t.co/pqJLVThysX

A member of Biden’s new coronavirus task force is a lockdown enthusiast who has written that living past 75 isn’t worth it.  Americans want our country opened up not creepy bioethicists who enjoy playing God. https://t.co/5NnFm4u7u1

Democratic governors encouraged—and often participated in—mass protests that didn't follow their own social distance guidelines.   How can they continue to discriminate against churches trying to safely reopen?

Liberals in Illinois wrecked the state's finances long before the China Virus—now they pass budgets that raise their own pay while anticipating billions in taxpayer bailouts.   Recklessness and arrogance.   https://t.co/2V6qpu7MW9

It's understandable why the murderous Chinese Communist Party doesn't want the Wuhan virus to be linked to China.   But it's mind-boggling that Senate Democrats are participating in China's propaganda.
Will Senate Democrats condemn CNN for saying "Wuhan Coronavirus"? https://t.co/0vZ3NDi7mf

Senate Dems want to pass a resolution condemning the term "Wuhan virus".   But term was widely used even by the liberal media until the CCP started started pretending the virus came from the U.S.   Why are Dems helping the CCP push propaganda through Senate resolutions? https://t.co/i4zUOL0MHw

Since I first learned of the Wuhan coronavirus in mid-January common sense has been my guide. Not Chinese communist lies. Not “the models.” Not so-called “public-health experts.” Just common sense. Many elected leaders have also been guided by common sense. Others haven’t.

China's lies helped spread the Wuhan coronavirus.   China is our biggest long-term threat.  @JoeBiden has been weak on China his whole career.   This campaign Joe needs to answer for failing to stand up to China. https://t.co/pQGmdSotKB

The "experts" cited by the New York Times who are deeply concerned about calling the Wuhan coronavirus by its name ought to direct their complaints at the New York Times. https://t.co/BmIMASaMya https://t.co/9FL0BPJvP9

China is a growing threat and China's duplicity helped spread the Wuhan coronavirus.   @JoeBiden has been weak on China his whole career.   Biden supported bad trade deals claimed China is "not competition" and can't be trusted to take on China.  https://t.co/H5BmIg9sd4
On January 28 I called for a travel ban on China because of the spread of the Wuhan coronavirus. (1/3)  https://t.co/ijRXMkq8d8
